```scss
// Property: shuffleMode
// Description: Shuffle setting.
// Component(s): Ti.Media.MusicPlayer
'.shuffle-mode-music-player-albums': { shuffleMode: Ti.Media.MUSIC_PLAYER_SHUFFLE_ALBUMS }
'.shuffle-mode-music-player': { shuffleMode: Ti.Media.MUSIC_PLAYER_SHUFFLE_DEFAULT }
'.shuffle-mode-music-player-none': { shuffleMode: Ti.Media.MUSIC_PLAYER_SHUFFLE_NONE }
'.shuffle-mode-music-player-songs': { shuffleMode: Ti.Media.MUSIC_PLAYER_SHUFFLE_SONGS }
```
